{{Wired embedded system |brand=Edgewater Networks |model=EdgeMarc 4552 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Unicomm |type=router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.33 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=MPC8358E |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256EHT2I-90Q |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T51163Q1-HCE6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J4 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9,, (9600 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306SD |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=10/100 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Intersil;ISL12026;;1;,,, 3-Port USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;μPD720102GC;;1;,,, 16-bit I2C-bus I/O port Expander;NXP;PCA9555;;1;,,, 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, Dual Port USB Power Switch;National Semiconductor;LM3526;;1;,,, DDR II Termination Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G2996;;1;,,, 16-bit D-type Transparent Latch w/ 3-State In/Out;NXP;74LVC16373A;;2;,,, Four-channel E1/T1/J1 Framer & Line Interface;Infineon;PEF 22554;;1;,,, 3A, 24V Asynchronous Step‐Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT1583;;2;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous-Rectified Buck Controller;uPI Semi;uP6101;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;2; |flags=T1/E1 Interface, RTC w/ battery backup, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.3.0-rc2; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.22; |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=default |oui_eth=A8:70:A5 }} {{TagLine|EdgeMarc 4552 Networking Gateway}} :''Edgewater EdgeMarc 4552 Security Router'' • [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/4550series/4552_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] • [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/4550series/4552_HIG.pdf Hardware Installation Guide]
*Device has 4x T1/E1 RJ-45 interfaces. {{See also|Edgewater}}
==Images== <gallery> File:Edgewater 4552 Internal.jpeg|Internal view File:Edgewater 4552 Main top.jpeg|Top of main board File:Edgewater 4552 Main bottom.jpeg|Bottom of main board </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
